name: Crush the Industry (Demo)
description:
Add Crush the Industry to your Steam wishlist!

Work your way to the top of a big game studio in this roguelike deckbuilder inspired by classic JRPGs! The demo features the first floor of the full game. 

Features:

  • Challenging roguelike gameplay.
  • Toxic players you can fart on. 
  • Losing your mind.
  • ...and more! 

Join us on Discord! 

Follow us on Twitter! 

  

Note: Mac version is not notarized for newer versions of macOS. Try CTRL + right-clicking the application and selecting "Open".
